name: Parasitic Slayers
description:
This is a game I made with my friends for a high school project. In this game, you're a hero with a single weapon (a Bow) to shoot down enemies and conquer the dungeon. 

This project is made for me to learn game making and its component and participate in a school project with my friends. 

*Note: I won't be continuing this project as the school project is finished and I want to try other types and genres of games.

Created with Godot, coded with gdscript. These is the assets I used:

https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

https://mounirtohami.itch.io/pixel-art-gui-elements

https://vrtxrry.itch.io/dungeonfont

https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?isrc=USUAN1200066

CONTROLS:

WASD keys to move

Left-click to shoot

Esc to pause
